description: A luxury 10-day solo journey experiencing Vietnam’s highlights in comfort and style: Hanoi’s culture and cuisine, Halong Bay by premium cruise, Hoi An’s riverside charm, and Ho Chi Minh City’s cosmopolitan energy. Includes stays in landmark hotels, private tours, spa days, and fine dining.

activities: Arrival in Hanoi; private airport transfer to luxury hotel; fine dining dinner
itinerary.notes: Budget is $2,000; focus on luxury hotels, private tours, fine dining, premium cruises, and business-class domestic flights

activities: Private chauffeur tour of Old Quarter, Hoan Kiem Lake, and the Temple of Literature; lunch at La Verticale; spa afternoon; evening free
